TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowTrackingLocation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines an interest in specific workflow status events that occur in a root workflow instance; used for matching by a in a tracking profile. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure. A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> expresses an interest in locations of the workflow instance where specific types of workflow status events occur. Add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> to specify the workflow status events to be matched. A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance. You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No workflow status events to match are specified. You must add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to match any workflow status events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> events) cil managed

Docs.param: IList of tracking workflow events to be matched.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that matches the specified tracking workflow events.
Gets the list of workflow status events that will be matched for this location.
Docs.value: A list of values that specifies the workflow status events for which the location will be matched. The default is an empty list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> contains the list of workflow status events for which this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> will be matched. You can track the specified workflow status events by adding the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is part of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
